thread.title: Louis Tomlinson's girlfriend Eleanor Calder SURROUNDED by security as she's escorted through airport following his arrest
thread.title_full: Louis Tomlinson's girlfriend Eleanor Calder SURROUNDED by security as she's escorted through airport following his arrest

author: Vicki Newman
title: Louis Tomlinson's girlfriend Eleanor Calder SURROUNDED by security as she's escorted through airport following his arrest
text:
Louis Tomlinson's girlfriend Eleanor Calder SURROUNDED by security as she's escorted through airport following his arrest She was pictured being led through LAX after what happened Share Louis Tomlinson's girlfriend Eleanor Calder was led through LAX by security (Photo: FameFlynet) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Louis Tomlinson 's girlfriend was surrounded by security and staff as she was led through Los Angeles International Airport. 
Eleanor Calder , 24, was heavily guarded as she walked through LAX - without Louis - following last weekend's incident. 
The One Direction star was arrested following following an altercation with paparazzi photographer Karl Larsen, who was taking pictures of Eleanor at LAX on Saturday. 
Louis also stepped in to help Eleanor after she was attacked by a group of girls. 
But she made sure she was safe this time. Read More Eleanor was escorted through LAX following last weekend's events (Photo: Splash News) Eleanor was attacked by a group of girls in the airport (Photo: FameFlynet UK) 
Dressed in tracksuit bottoms, T-shirt and letterman jacket, she walked in the middle of a male security guard and a female, who held onto her arms and protected her. 
Eleanor tried to remain incognito with the help of a baseball cap and sunglasses, but she was still spotted by photographers who took snaps of her being escorted. 
Louis, 25, is unlikely to face court over the incident, it has been reported. 
The singer could be hit with two misdemean­­our charges , each carrying a maximum six-month sentence, if convicted. Her boyfriend Louis Tomlinson was arrested following an altercation with a photographer (Photo: FameFlynet UK) Louis and Eleanor had been away in Las Vegas before the incident (Photo: Splash) 
But according to reports in the US, there is a “strong likelihood” that Louis will not have to face court and instead attend an informal hearing in the LA City Attorney's Office. 
There he could be bound over to keep the peace and may be ordered to take several anger management classes if it was considered he was involved in wrongdoing. 
Louis was released on $20,000 (£16,000) bail after being arrested at LAX airport. 
He was detained following an altercation with two girls and a photographer during which he tripped and appeared to accidentally drag the snapper to the floor with him. She was getting out of town following the incident (Photo: FameFlynet UK) They've known each other for a long time (Photo: WENN) 
The situation deteriorated when two female fans got into a physical altercation with Louis’ girlfriend. 
The cameraman, who has since hired famed attorney Gloria Allred, claims to have hit his head in the scuffle. 
Doncaster-born Louis has since told friends “I was protecting my girlfriend”. 
The singer has hired Marty “Mad Dog” Singer to represent him to ensure his visa status in the States is not affected. Read More She was spotted by paparazzi (Photo: Splash News) Louis' charges carry maximum jail terms of six months (Photo: Instagram) 
Louis has a one-year-old son, Freddie who lives in America with his ex-flame Briana Jungwirth. 
Sources close to Singer’s team have said they a carrying out a thorough investigation into Larsen, who previously was involved in a tussle with singer Lana Del Rey’s security team. 
He sued for $1 million in 2013 but the case was later dismissed indicating there was a settlement. 
Also of interest is an interview Larsen conducted with famed US shock jock Howard Stern during which he allegedly “gloated about his confrontation with Mel Gibson, boasting his plan was to berate Gibson into going nuclear.” Like us on Facebook
